actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to delay the effectiveness of court orders with respect to school busing until all appeals from such orders have been taken.

summary.text: Provides that the effectiveness of any United States district court order which requires the busing of students for purposes of desegregation or racial balance shall be postponed until all appeals from such order have been exhausted or the time for such appeals has expired.

titles.title: A bill to delay the effectiveness of court orders with respect to school busing until all appeals from such orders have been taken.
